content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET, DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec')
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'wtkcodingdlfs_wtkcodingdla_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [wtkcodingdlfs_wtkcodingdla_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://wtkcodingdlfs@wtkcodingdla.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE SCHEMA [ext];
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext.Top5_Regions (
	[updated] date,
	[country_region] nvarchar(4000),
	[confirmed] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'top5-regions',
	DATA_SOURCE = [wtkcodingdlfs_wtkcodingdla_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ext.Top5_Regions
GO
